header.title: Connect Your Data
header.subtitle: Send your retail data to blipee OS in minutes. Choose between our no-code integrations or use our powerful API for custom implementations.

square.title: Square POS
square.description: Connect your Square account with a single click. Automatically sync transactions, customer data, and inventory levels in real-time.

shopify.title: Shopify
shopify.description: Install the blipee OS app from Shopify App Store. Seamlessly integrates with your store's analytics and customer behavior data.

clover.title: Clover POS
clover.description: Authorize blipee OS to access your Clover data. Sync sales, inventory, and customer insights automatically.

csv.title: CSV/Excel Upload
csv.description: Simply drag and drop your CSV or Excel files. Our smart mapper automatically identifies and maps your data columns.

camera.title: Camera Systems
camera.description: Connect existing security cameras via RTSP streams or install our lightweight plugin for supported camera systems.

zapier.title: Zapier Integration
zapier.description: Connect blipee OS with thousands of apps through Zapier. Create automated workflows without any coding.

api.title: blipee OS Data Ingestion API
api.description: Our RESTful API allows you to send retail data from any source. Built for developers, designed for scale, and optimized for real-time analytics.

dataTypes.title: Supported Data Types
dataTypes.subtitle: Send any of these data types to blipee OS for instant analytics:

cta.title: Ready to Connect Your Data?
cta.subtitle: Start sending data to blipee OS today and see insights in real-time
